sentences.cn: 在纳什维尔的一间录音室

sentences.en: Claude is the studio's head honcho .
sentences.cn: 克劳德是电影公司的老板。

sentences.en: Depardieu is making a film with one of the big Hollywood studios.
sentences.cn: 德帕迪约正在为好莱坞的一家大制片公司拍摄一部电影。

sentences.en: Hemingway's studio is to the right.
sentences.cn: 海明威的工作室在右面。

sentences.en: I cut it out and pinned it to my studio wall.
sentences.cn: 我把它剪下来钉在我工作室的墙上。

sentences.en: I outfitted an attic bedroom as a studio.
sentences.cn: 我把阁楼卧室改装成了工作室。

sentences.en: I spend days on end in this studio.
sentences.cn: 我一连几天呆在这个工作室里。

sentences.en: In 1933 the studio cranked out fifty-five feature films.
sentences.cn: 1993年，该电影公司粗制滥造出了55部故事片。

sentences.en: She had a call from him on Saturday morning at the studio.
sentences.cn: 星期六早上她在录音室接到他打来的电话。

sentences.en: She'smuch happier performing live than in a recording studio.
sentences.cn: 与在录音棚里录音相比，她更喜欢现场表演。

sentences.en: The brothers usually roll into their studio around midday.
sentences.cn: 兄弟几个总是要到正午前后才姗姗来到工作室。

sentences.en: The film studio grudgingly agreed to allow him to continue working.
sentences.cn: 这家电影公司勉强同意让他继续工作。

sentences.en: The film studio is transferring to Hollywood.
sentences.cn: 这家电影制片厂正迁往好莱坞。

sentences.en: The rehearsal studio is buzzing with lunchtime activity.
sentences.cn: 大家在吃午饭，排练室里很是嘈杂。

sentences.en: There was nervous tittering in the studio audience.
sentences.cn: 演播室观众席上传来紧张的低笑声。

words.tran_cn: 工作室；[电视][广播]演播室；画室；电影制片厂

phrases.tran_cn: 美术工作室，艺术工作室
n. 一个房间的小公寓住宅

trans.tran_cn: 工作室，录音室，电影公司，练功房，单间公寓
trans.tran_en: a room where television and radio programmes are made and broadcast or where music is recorded
